name: Buzz Off! (NotEuclid)
description:
One day, you’re sitting at your desk when a mosquito flies in through your window and sits on your windowsill. Annoyed by its presence, you attempt to slap the mosquito, but only then do you realize your fatal mistake: this mosquito isn’t messing around.

Controls: A and D to move, and Space to jump.

This was made under 3 hours for Trijam #152, and the theme was "Leave me alone!" I think my interpretation is pretty obvious and relatable. Aim for a high score by collecting as many coins as possible before the mosquito bites you!

All assets were made by me within the 3 hours except for the game over sound (for which I combined two sound effects from pixabay), the ambience also from pixabay, the player sprite and animations (which I reused from an earlier game of mine), and the jump and coin collection sounds (which I made for general purpose with bfxr). I would also like to credit GDG^meplayer for the name suggestion.
